A

ActionException - exception org.webmacro.as.ActionException.
Exception used by ActionServlet.
ActionException(String) - Constructor for class org.webmacro.as.ActionException
Creates an exception with the specified message.
ActionException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for class org.webmacro.as.ActionException
Creates an exception with the specified message and nested exception.
ActionServlet - class org.webmacro.as.ActionServlet.
Highly configurable servlet that enables mapping of HTTP requests to methods of components. Note: Because ActionServlet is no longer abstract class, subclassing is not necessary unless you need to modify some of its functionality.
ActionServlet() - Constructor for class org.webmacro.as.ActionServlet
 
afterInvoke(Object, WebContext, String, String, Object[]) - Method in class org.webmacro.as.ActionServlet
Method called right after each action method invocation.

Method called right before each action method.

CompositeTypeHandler - interface org.webmacro.as.CompositeTypeHandler.

ConversionException - exception org.webmacro.as.ConversionException.

D

destroy() - Method in interface org.webmacro.as.Destroyed
Method called when ActionServlet knows, it will not use this component any longer.
Destroyed - interface org.webmacro.as.Destroyed.
Interface implemented by a component that wants to be informed when it is no longer used by ActionServlet.
destroySession() - Method in class org.webmacro.as.ActionServlet
Invalidates this thread's session and forces destroy()-ing of components with "session" persistence (does nothing if called from a non-session thread).

W

wasThrownInCompositeHandler() - Method in class org.webmacro.as.ConversionException
Returns true, if this exception was thrown in composite type handler, which means that methods getComponentName() and getComponentValue() may return sensible information.
